Programs http://www2.le.ac.uk daily 1 2006-02-14T08:00:00Z Install a program? http://www2.le.ac.uk/offices/itservices/ithelp/faq/how/install-a-program See the Programs section for descriptions of all the programs we provide. You can browse for your desired program using the Program Installer.

]]> No publisher mh329 programs 2012-03-22T14:47:11Z Page View thumbnails of pictures? http://www2.le.ac.uk/offices/itservices/ithelp/faq/how/view-thumbnails-of-picturs On a Windows 7 University PC You will no longer be able to see thumbnails of images on network drives such as the Shared Departmental X: drive and your Personal Z: drive. As a work-around you can:

  • Right click on the thumbnail and choose Preview.
  • Use the Picture Manager to view thumbnail previews of pictures.

This issue has been reported to Microsoft. During testing we found that when you tried to copy, paste, delete or move a file or folder there was an intermittent error saying that the file was locked.

The cause of the problem was the thumbnails of the images. The problem was so severe that we were advised to switch the preview thumbnails off. We felt that losing the instant thumbnail preview was a preferable to being unable to move or copy a file.

]]> No publisher mh329 programs 2012-07-11T14:40:00Z Page
